review: The fire tv stick is slow, some movies don't play...save your money and get the amazon fire tv box works much better than the stick...works on ever movie and loads much quicker .....no lag on high definition movies....
author: eddie alvarez

review: Very simple setup, on-screen layout is nice, no issues so far. Does exactly what it says it's supposed to.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I enjoy watching the programs, but am constantly connecting and disconnecting the device to establish a wireless connection.
author: Peter John Solana

review: Easy set up and great for kids with the netflix app.
author: michael westbrook

review: Awesome. My tv gets a beautiful picture with the fire stick.
author: Rita Conley

review: Very much enjoying this...wish the Hulu app was better...Looking forward to the HBO app.
author: Mary Vukcevich

review: I feel like this was falsely advertised. I got the fire stick and then realized you had to buy almost every channel or subscribe to every channel. Wish things would have been more clear.
author: Jami

review: It is all I had hope for and even more.
author: Tom Mason
